title: High-Minded Gifts for Cannabis Enthusiasts
description: In The Green Scene, there's no such thing as a silly question about cannabis. What's the difference between THC and CBD? How the heck do I make edibles at home? What home design advice can dispensaries teach me? Kick back—we have the answers. If you’ve got a cannabis enthusiast in your life—or you are that person—consider this your high-minded guide to the coolest weed-adjacent gifts out there. From best-selling edibles and THC-infused drinks to design-forward accessories and low-dose treats for winding down, these picks are great for gifting (or keeping for yourself). Read More >>
author: Julia Youman
excerpt: From sleep-enhancing gummies to chic smoking accessories, discover the best cannabis gifts to elevate your 4/20 celebrations.
text: In The Green Scene, there's no such thing as a silly question about cannabis. What's the difference between THC and CBD? How the heck do I make edibles at home? What home design advice can dispensaries teach me? Kick back—we have the answers. If you’ve got a cannabis enthusiast in your life—or you are that person—consider this your high-minded guide to the coolest weed-adjacent gifts out there. From best-selling edibles and THC-infused drinks to design-forward accessories and low-dose treats for winding down, these picks are great for gifting (or keeping for yourself). When it comes to gifting, one of our philosophies is sharing things we’ve loved ourselves. No, not in a regifting kinda way (although that’s totally fine), but in an I-tried-it-and-think-you’ll-like-it-too kinda way. Case in point: these 20+ cannabis gifts that our team—and their favorite experts—want to pass on to fellow users whether they’re newbies, enthusiasts, or somewhere in between. From calming CBD gummies and THC-infused condiments to fruit-inspired pipes and beautifully designed coffee table books, these cannabis gifts are just as thoughtful (and in some cases, delicious) as anything else you’d gift a loved one. Clarity, focus, topical pain relief, and a mellow buzz—well, those are an added bonus. Ahead, 24 cannabis gifts for newbies and enthusiasts. 1. Camino Sours Raspberry Lemonade "Bliss" Gummies These vegan-friendly gummies offer a delightful blend of sweet raspberries and lemon. Each gummy contains 10mg of THC, complemented by a tailored mix of hybrid-like terpenes to promote a balanced, uplifting experience. Even Bon Appetit approves of these. 2. Gossamer Dawn Energizing THCV Tincture If your morning routine needs a little extra spark, Gossamer’s Dawn tincture might be your new favorite ritual. Formulated with a unique blend of full-spectrum CBD and energizing THCV, plus a crisp mix of terpenes like Eucalyptol, Pinene, and Limonene, it’s designed to help you start your day clear-headed and focused. Think of it as a brainy boost—minus the caffeine jitters. Photo by Hometown Hero 3. Hometown Hero Double Take Gummies Experience rapid onset and long-lasting effects with these versatile gummies. Ideal for microdosing or a full experience, they cater to both new and seasoned users. Photo by Barbari Shop 4. Barbari Free Time Hemp Spliff Crafted in Portland, Oregon, Barbari's Free Time Hemp Spliff offers a smooth, citrusy smoke designed for relaxation and creativity. Each pre-roll blends organic CBD-rich hemp with a curated mix of lemon balm, calendula, and wormwood—botanicals known for their calming and uplifting effects. Photo by Flower by Edie Parker 5. Early Bird Best Buds by Flower by Edie Parker Cute packaging, meet powerhouse pre-roll. Each Early Bird Best Buds set comes with two 0.5g sativa joints, perfectly portioned for a daytime boost of creativity and good vibes. Crafted with sustainably grown flower and zero filler, it’s luxury cannabis with a playful twist—proof that you really can have the best of both worlds. Photo by Gossamer 6. Fable Libations Elevate your mocktail game with these hemp-derived cocktails. Offering a euphoric buzz without the smoke, they're perfect for social gatherings. This curiosity pack offers their best flavors, all in one pack. Photo by Houseplant 7. Houseplant Ashtray Set by Seth, $98 Equal parts form and function, this Seth Rogen-designed ashtray set will replace anything they’ve been using up to this point. Add in the matching vase and the combo might as well be a centerpiece, the Houseplant team points out. Photo by Flower Union 8. Flower Union Brands Artisan Gummies For those who prefer edibles without artificial additives, these gummies offer a pure, fast-acting experience reminiscent of traditional inhalation. The Boost ones have 10 mg THC each and offer energetic, uplifting feelings. Photo by Z's Life 9. Z's Life Rolling Papers, $8 “Life is a little dull right now, so add some sparkle to any session with these beautifully packaged rolling papers,” says von Pfetten. Photo by Smokiez CBD 10. Wyld Elderberry Sleep Gummies Infused with CBN and real fruit, these gummies are perfect for winding down after festivities. Each piece offers a calming effect to help you drift into restful sleep. Photo by Charlotte's Web 11. Charlotte’s Web Hemp-Infused Balm Stick With CBD When Cabrales is out on long runs, she’s never without her trusty CBD balm for muscle tightness and shin splints. “And I love that it’s a stick—so easy to carry around and apply,” she says. “I don’t know where I'd be without it… probably in pain.” Photo by Recess 12. The Recess Sampler While it won’t give you the same buzz as hard seltzer, Recess’ sampler pack of hemp-infused sparkling waters are delicious and calming—perfect for a post-work wind-down. The packaging is surprisingly chic for a canned drink, you might even be tempted to grab a six-pack if you’re headed to meet friends. Photo by Potli 13. Friends NYC Big Match Lighter Friends NYC has a fun selection of unique lighters, including this design of a giant match. It comes filled and is refillable with butane. They also have a cute selection of lighter wraps and pattern (we love the butter and chocolate ones). 14. Edie Parker Mini Tabletop Grinder Add a pop of color to your ritual with this four-piece metal grinder from Edie Parker. Featuring a vibrant, color-blocked rubberized finish, it combines playful aesthetics with practical functionality. Compact yet efficient, it's designed to make your daily grind a little more delightful Photo by Gossamer 15. Gossamer Volume Seven: Touch Von Pfetten loves gifting a curated trio of books or magazines that she thinks the recipient would love or at least be interested in. “I know I'm biased, but I'd include a copy of Gossamer in every installment, if I could!,” she says. “The latest issue—Volume Seven: Touch—is immersive and interactive, with a mix of interior textures (and scents!), and a fuzzy, feelable cover, all dedicated to our most tactile sense—and the one we have missed the most these last couple years.” Photo by Flower by Edie Parker 16. Flower by Edie Parker Fruit Pipe And while we’re on the topic of interiors, Heyman’s fun strawberry pipe is both decorative yet fully functional—however they choose to use it is up to them. Photo by Houseplant 17. Houseplant Vinyl Box Set Vol. 3 This isn’t just another Spotify playlist. No, it’s a trio of vinyl with songs curated by Rogen and Houseplant co-founder Evan Goldberg perfectly set for each strain type—upbeat for sativa, mellow for indica, and a happy middle for hybrid. And yes, you need a record player for these. From Our Shop Photo by Laundry Day 18. Laundry Day Stainless Steel Ashtray This sculptural stainless steel ashtray from Laundry Day blends industrial design with everyday function, featuring two sleek compartments for easy use and cleanup—perfect for both indoor and outdoor sessions. Photo by Extract Labs 19. Extract Labs CBD Isolate Or take a cue from video editing lead Rob Strype and DIY edibles, tinctures, or lotions with pure CBD isolate. They can also vape it straight up, if that’s more their style. Photo by Prim Botanicals 20. The Releefer CBD Roll On Muscle and Joint Gel CBD can also help with topical pain relief, something that manager of video distribution Nicole Cukingnan needs due to a less-than-ideal WFH setup. “I’ve had tennis elbow off and on for many years now from too much keyboard typing,” says Cukingnan. “But over this period of working from home, it got really bad probably because of my not-so-great desk setup. Now, whenever I get flare-ups I just use this and say buh-bye to pain. Also bonus: it’s minty!” Photo by Summerland 21. Summerland Fruit Fantasy We love fun fruit decor in all its forms, especially this modern, super-shiny apple pipe. Von Pfetten loves that you can tuck it into a bookshelf until you want a lil’ amuse bouche before dinner—the ultimate party trick. Photo by Papers + Ink 22. Papers + Ink Custom-Printed Organic Rolling Papers Kit These Barbie's Powder room ones are cute as are these multi-colored stained glass ones. Naturally, senior graphic designer Angelyn Cabrales loves these rolling papers. “Particularly with the gradient ones, it’s like a rainbow when you smoke,” she says. Photo by Kiva Confection 23. Kiva Confections Midnight Blueberry If you live in an area where THC is legal, VP of creative Elizabeth Spiridakis Olson likes these sleep-inducing gummies. “I live in New Jersey, where it’s legal, and they’re the only way I sleep through the night,” she says. And don’t we all need more of that? Photo by House of Wise 24. House of Wise Sleep + Sex + Stress Gummy Trio Product designer Yoojung Jang loves House of Wise's empowering message of taking control of your sleep, stress, and sex so much that she gifts them to all her friends. Do you use any CBD or THC products? What’s been your fave? Drop some inspo in the comments below! If you're considering enjoying the products and/or recipes in this content, please consult and follow the legal restrictions for controlled substances in your state. Because there are so many variables with cannabis products, go slowly. You may want to start with half a serving and determine your tolerance and ideal dose from there. And always wait a couple hours to feel the effects.
html:
In The Green Scene, there's no such thing as a silly question about cannabis. What's the difference between THC and CBD? How the heck do I make edibles at home? What home design advice can dispensaries teach me? Kick back—we have the answers.

If you’ve got a cannabis enthusiast in your life—or you are that person—consider this your high-minded guide to the coolest weed-adjacent gifts out there. From best-selling edibles and THC-infused drinks to design-forward accessories and low-dose treats for winding down, these picks are great for gifting (or keeping for yourself).

When it comes to gifting, one of our philosophies is sharing things we’ve loved ourselves. No, not in a regifting kinda way (although that’s totally fine), but in an I-tried-it-and-think-you’ll-like-it-too kinda way. Case in point: these 20+ cannabis gifts that our team—and their favorite experts—want to pass on to fellow users whether they’re newbies, enthusiasts, or somewhere in between.

From calming CBD gummies and THC-infused condiments to fruit-inspired pipes and beautifully designed coffee table books, these cannabis gifts are just as thoughtful (and in some cases, delicious) as anything else you’d gift a loved one. Clarity, focus, topical pain relief, and a mellow buzz—well, those are an added bonus.

Ahead, 24 cannabis gifts for newbies and enthusiasts.

1. Camino Sours Raspberry Lemonade "Bliss" Gummies

These vegan-friendly gummies offer a delightful blend of sweet raspberries and lemon. Each gummy contains 10mg of THC, complemented by a tailored mix of hybrid-like terpenes to promote a balanced, uplifting experience. Even Bon Appetit approves of these.

2. Gossamer Dawn Energizing THCV Tincture

If your morning routine needs a little extra spark, Gossamer’s Dawn tincture might be your new favorite ritual. Formulated with a unique blend of full-spectrum CBD and energizing THCV, plus a crisp mix of terpenes like Eucalyptol, Pinene, and Limonene, it’s designed to help you start your day clear-headed and focused. Think of it as a brainy boost—minus the caffeine jitters.

3. Hometown Hero Double Take Gummies

Experience rapid onset and long-lasting effects with these versatile gummies. Ideal for microdosing or a full experience, they cater to both new and seasoned users.

4. Barbari Free Time Hemp Spliff

Crafted in Portland, Oregon, Barbari's Free Time Hemp Spliff offers a smooth, citrusy smoke designed for relaxation and creativity. Each pre-roll blends organic CBD-rich hemp with a curated mix of lemon balm, calendula, and wormwood—botanicals known for their calming and uplifting effects.

5. Early Bird Best Buds by Flower by Edie Parker

Cute packaging, meet powerhouse pre-roll. Each Early Bird Best Buds set comes with two 0.5g sativa joints, perfectly portioned for a daytime boost of creativity and good vibes. Crafted with sustainably grown flower and zero filler, it’s luxury cannabis with a playful twist—proof that you really can have the best of both worlds.

6. Fable Libations

Elevate your mocktail game with these hemp-derived cocktails. Offering a euphoric buzz without the smoke, they're perfect for social gatherings. This curiosity pack offers their best flavors, all in one pack.

7. Houseplant Ashtray Set by Seth, $98

Equal parts form and function, this Seth Rogen-designed ashtray set will replace anything they’ve been using up to this point. Add in the matching vase and the combo might as well be a centerpiece, the Houseplant team points out.

8. Flower Union Brands Artisan Gummies

For those who prefer edibles without artificial additives, these gummies offer a pure, fast-acting experience reminiscent of traditional inhalation. The Boost ones have 10 mg THC each and offer energetic, uplifting feelings.

9. Z's Life Rolling Papers, $8

“Life is a little dull right now, so add some sparkle to any session with these beautifully packaged rolling papers,” says von Pfetten.

10. Wyld Elderberry Sleep Gummies

Infused with CBN and real fruit, these gummies are perfect for winding down after festivities. Each piece offers a calming effect to help you drift into restful sleep.

11. Charlotte’s Web Hemp-Infused Balm Stick With CBD

When Cabrales is out on long runs, she’s never without her trusty CBD balm for muscle tightness and shin splints. “And I love that it’s a stick—so easy to carry around and apply,” she says. “I don’t know where I'd be without it… probably in pain.”

12. The Recess Sampler

While it won’t give you the same buzz as hard seltzer, Recess’ sampler pack of hemp-infused sparkling waters are delicious and calming—perfect for a post-work wind-down. The packaging is surprisingly chic for a canned drink, you might even be tempted to grab a six-pack if you’re headed to meet friends.

13. Friends NYC Big Match Lighter

Friends NYC has a fun selection of unique lighters, including this design of a giant match. It comes filled and is refillable with butane. They also have a cute selection of lighter wraps and pattern (we love the butter and chocolate ones).

14. Edie Parker Mini Tabletop Grinder

Add a pop of color to your ritual with this four-piece metal grinder from Edie Parker. Featuring a vibrant, color-blocked rubberized finish, it combines playful aesthetics with practical functionality. Compact yet efficient, it's designed to make your daily grind a little more delightful

15. Gossamer Volume Seven: Touch

Von Pfetten loves gifting a curated trio of books or magazines that she thinks the recipient would love or at least be interested in. “I know I'm biased, but I'd include a copy of Gossamer in every installment, if I could!,” she says. “The latest issue—Volume Seven: Touch—is immersive and interactive, with a mix of interior textures (and scents!), and a fuzzy, feelable cover, all dedicated to our most tactile sense—and the one we have missed the most these last couple years.”

16. Flower by Edie Parker Fruit Pipe

And while we’re on the topic of interiors, Heyman’s fun strawberry pipe is both decorative yet fully functional—however they choose to use it is up to them.

17. Houseplant Vinyl Box Set Vol. 3

This isn’t just another Spotify playlist. No, it’s a trio of vinyl with songs curated by Rogen and Houseplant co-founder Evan Goldberg perfectly set for each strain type—upbeat for sativa, mellow for indica, and a happy middle for hybrid. And yes, you need a record player for these.

From Our Shop

18. Laundry Day Stainless Steel Ashtray

This sculptural stainless steel ashtray from Laundry Day blends industrial design with everyday function, featuring two sleek compartments for easy use and cleanup—perfect for both indoor and outdoor sessions.

19. Extract Labs CBD Isolate

Or take a cue from video editing lead Rob Strype and DIY edibles, tinctures, or lotions with pure CBD isolate. They can also vape it straight up, if that’s more their style.

20. The Releefer CBD Roll On Muscle and Joint Gel

CBD can also help with topical pain relief, something that manager of video distribution Nicole Cukingnan needs due to a less-than-ideal WFH setup. “I’ve had tennis elbow off and on for many years now from too much keyboard typing,” says Cukingnan. “But over this period of working from home, it got really bad probably because of my not-so-great desk setup. Now, whenever I get flare-ups I just use this and say buh-bye to pain. Also bonus: it’s minty!”

21. Summerland Fruit Fantasy

We love fun fruit decor in all its forms, especially this modern, super-shiny apple pipe. Von Pfetten loves that you can tuck it into a bookshelf until you want a lil’ amuse bouche before dinner—the ultimate party trick.

22. Papers + Ink Custom-Printed Organic Rolling Papers Kit

These Barbie's Powder room ones are cute as are these multi-colored stained glass ones. Naturally, senior graphic designer Angelyn Cabrales loves these rolling papers. “Particularly with the gradient ones, it’s like a rainbow when you smoke,” she says.

23. Kiva Confections Midnight Blueberry

If you live in an area where THC is legal, VP of creative Elizabeth Spiridakis Olson likes these sleep-inducing gummies. “I live in New Jersey, where it’s legal, and they’re the only way I sleep through the night,” she says. And don’t we all need more of that?

24. House of Wise Sleep + Sex + Stress Gummy Trio

Product designer Yoojung Jang loves House of Wise's empowering message of taking control of your sleep, stress, and sex so much that she gifts them to all her friends.

Do you use any CBD or THC products? What’s been your fave? Drop some inspo in the comments below!
If you're considering enjoying the products and/or recipes in this content, please consult and follow the legal restrictions for controlled substances in your state. Because there are so many variables with cannabis products, go slowly. You may want to start with half a serving and determine your tolerance and ideal dose from there. And always wait a couple hours to feel the effects.
